name: Repulsor (itch)
description:
Repulsor is a physics action game. With a total of 30 levels, the player is tasked with destroying all enemies on said level by throwing them into hazards or hazards into them!

Levels are ranked based on completion time, so get in the speedrunner's spirit and experiment to find the fastest route to destroy all enemies in a level! With levels designed to provide you with a multitude of different choices at any given moment, Repulsor is both an action and puzzle game by insuring there is no obvious correct answer on how to get the highest ranking on a level.
